description: Perfect application for taking notes, it's easier to organize than something like GNOME notes and has a better UI than something like Joplin.

I was looking for a simple app to sync my simple Nextcloud Notes. Most apps, like Joplin, become to complex, or are written in Electron, which makes them dreadfully slow. Iotas works very well due to its simplicity. At the moment, I would love for categories to be implemented, but it already does the trick of getting (work) thoughts out of my head, and accessible where I need it.
summary: Still basic, but that's a good thing!

description: Very nice. Fast search, fast sync with nextcloud, looks good!

Finally a notes app that's actually simple & sensible enough that it's not getting in my way all the time.

A massive thanks to the creator!
The UI is simple and easy to understand. Evey feature that I need is present. Overall very good app
It works, looks good and syncs wonderfully with Nextloud.

Before I had to install the nextcloud app in order to use nextcloud notes along with a sync server and a separate server app and now I can just use this and go. Thanks so much to the developers for providing a simplified user experience!
summary: finally a simple to use notes app for self hosted nextcloud!

description: It works just fine. When I'll switch to a linux phone I will definitely use this app.
I have been looking for a mobile compatible app to make lists as well as notes. Its simple to use. It would be great if you could sort your lists and check off todos as they get accomplished.
summary: Good app but lacks sort function

description: Muy buena alternativa a la app de notes by gnome, algo por mejorar seria que se pueda poner negrilla a las palabras, lista de viñetas, entre otras opciones de escritura
I'm getting "Secret Service could not be accessed for storing authentication details. Ensure you have a provider such as gnome-keyring" even though gnome-keyring is installed.
summary: Fails to connect with Nextcloud instance

description: This is the perfect simple note taking app with markdown support!

If you want to access your Nextcloud notes using a stand-alone app, then this is the app to use. If you are looking for a more powerful markdown notes editor, then you might want to check out something like Joplin instead.
summary: A Nextcloud notes app. Nothing more, nothing less

description: Tut was es soll, dazu klares und schönes Design. Wenn es jetzt noch mehr Formatierungen und die Möglichkeit für Anhänge gäbe, dann wäre es wirklich perfekt.

No entiendo cómo es que dice dar prioridad en su diseño a los dispositivos móviles y sin embargo no aparece su versión para dispositivos móviles (?) 

A pesar de eso, me parece buena opción para notas rápidas y sencillas, además se sincroniza perfectamente con Nextcloud.
Je cherche depuis longtemps une application avec la Synchro Nextcloud, vraiment bien!
Manque peut-être un jeu de couleurs selon les notes...
